teamstoolkit.accountTree.azureAccountToo:
AZURE ACCOUNT  
The Teams Toolkit requires Azure subscription to deploy the Azure resources for your project.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.copilotMessage: Microsoft 365 account administrator hasn't enabled Copilot access for this account. Contact your Teams administrator to resolve this issue by enrolling in Microsoft 365 Copilot Early Access program.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.copilotStatusUn: We're unable to confirm copilot access status. Please try again after some time.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.copilotWarningT: Microsoft 365 account administrator hasn't enabled Copilot access for this account. Contact your Teams administrator to resolve this issue by enrolling in Microsoft 365 Copilot Early Access program. Visit: https://aka.ms/PluginsEarlyAccess
teamstoolkit.accountTree.m365AccountTool:
Microsoft 365 ACCOUNT  
The Teams Toolkit requires a Microsoft 365 organizational account with Teams running and registered.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.sideloadingMess: [Custom app upload](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/concepts/build-and-test/prepare-your-o365-tenant#enable-custom-teams-apps-and-turn-on-custom-app-uploading) is disabled in your Microsoft 365 account. Contact your Teams administrator to resolve this issue or get a testing tenant.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.sideloadingPass: You already have permission to upload custom apps. Feel free to install your app in Teams.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.sideloadingStat: We're unable to confirm your custom app upload permission now. Please try again later.
teamstoolkit.accountTree.sideloadingWarn:
Your Microsoft 365 account admin hasn't enabled custom app upload permission.
· Contact your Teams admin to fix this. Visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/m365-apps/prerequisites
· For help, visit the Microsoft Teams documentation. To create a free testing tenant, click "Custom App Upload Disabled" label under your account.
teamstoolkit.appStudioLogin.loginCancel: Sign-in canceled. Teams Toolkit needs a Microsoft 365 account with custom app upload permission. You are using old SPFx version in your project and the current Teams Toolkit supports SPFx v%s. To upgrade, follow 'CLI for Microsoft 365'.

Si sta usando una versione più recente di SPFx nel progetto, mentre la versione corrente di Teams Toolkit supporta SPFx v%s. Si noti che alcune delle funzionalità più recenti di SPFx potrebbero non essere supportate. Se non si usa la versione più recente di Teams Toolkit, è consigliabile eseguire l'aggiornamento.

teamstoolkit.guides.addAzureAPIM.detail: An API gateway manages APIs for Teams apps, making them available for consumption by other apps like Power Apps.
teamstoolkit.guides.addAzureAPIM.label: Integrazione con Gestione API di Azure
teamstoolkit.guides.addAzureFunction.det: Soluzione serverless per creare API Web per il back-end delle applicazioni Teams.
teamstoolkit.guides.addAzureKeyVault.det: Proteggere le chiavi di crittografia e altri segreti usati dall'applicazione Teams.
teamstoolkit.guides.addAzureSql.detail: Motore di database platform-as-a-service (PaaS) da usare come archivio dati delle applicazioni Teams.
teamstoolkit.guides.addAzureSql.label: Integrazione con database SQL di Azure
teamstoolkit.guides.addBot.detail: Chatbot o bot per conversazioni che svolge attività semplici e ripetitive per gli utenti.
teamstoolkit.guides.addBot.label: Configura la funzionalità bot
teamstoolkit.guides.addME.detail: Consentire agli utenti di interagire con il servizio Web tramite pulsanti e moduli.
teamstoolkit.guides.addME.label: Configura la funzionalità di estensione per la messaggistica

teamstoolkit.guides.addOutlookAddin.labe: Configura la funzionalità del componente aggiuntivo per Outlook
teamstoolkit.guides.addSso.detail: Sviluppare una funzionalità di Single Sign-On per la funzionalità bot e le pagine di avvio di Teams.
teamstoolkit.guides.addSso.label: Sviluppa un'esperienza Single Sign-On in Teams
teamstoolkit.guides.addTab.detail: Pagine Web compatibili con Teams incorporate in Microsoft Teams.
teamstoolkit.guides.addTab.label: Configura la funzionalità scheda
teamstoolkit.guides.cardActionResponse.d: Automate routine business tasks through conversation.
teamstoolkit.guides.cardActionResponse.l: Avviare flussi di lavoro sequenziali in Teams
teamstoolkit.guides.notificationBot.labe: Panoramica del modello di bot di notifica
teamstoolkit.guides.cicdPipeline.detail: Automatizzare il flusso di lavoro di sviluppo durante la compilazione dell'applicazione Teams per GitHub, Azure DevOps e Jenkins.
teamstoolkit.guides.cicdPipeline.label: Automatizza le pipeline CI/CD
teamstoolkit.guides.mobilePreview.detail: Eseguire ed eseguire il debug dell'applicazione Teams nel client iOS o Android.
teamstoolkit.guides.mobilePreview.label: Esecuzione ed esecuzione del debug nel client per dispositivi mobili
teamstoolkit.guides.multiTenant.detail: Enable Multi-Tenant support for Teams app.
teamstoolkit.guides.multiTenant.label: Supporto multi-tenant
teamstoolkit.guides.commandAndResponse.d: Automate routine tasks using simple commands in a chat.
teamstoolkit.guides.commandAndResponse.l: Rispondi ai comandi della chat in Teams
teamstoolkit.guides.connectApi.detail: Connettersi a un'API con il supporto per l'autenticazione usando TeamsFx SDK.

teamstoolkit.guides.dashboardApp.detail: Embed a canvas with multiple cards for data or content overview in Microsoft Teams.
teamstoolkit.guides.dashboardApp.label: Incorpora un'area di disegno dashboard in Teams
teamstoolkit.guides.sendNotification.det: Inviare notifiche a Teams dai servizi Web con bot o webhook in ingresso.

teamstoolkit.taskDefinitions.command.pre:
Convalidare i prerequisiti.
 Per informazioni dettagliate e su come personalizzare gli argomenti, vedere https://aka.ms/teamsfx-tasks/check-prerequisites.
teamstoolkit.taskDefinitions.command.sta:
Avviare il servizio di tunneling locale.
 Per informazioni dettagliate e su come personalizzare gli argomenti, vedere https://aka.ms/teamsfx-tasks/local-tunnel.
teamstoolkit.taskDefinitions.command.pro:
Eseguire il ciclo di vita del provisioning.
 Per informazioni dettagliate e su come personalizzare gli argomenti, vedere https://aka.ms/teamsfx-tasks/provision.
teamstoolkit.taskDefinitions.command.dep:
Eseguire il ciclo di vita della distribuzione.
 Per informazioni dettagliate e su come personalizzare gli argomenti, vedere https://aka.ms/teamsfx-tasks/deploy.
teamstoolkit.taskDefinitions.command.lau:
Avviare il client Web di Teams. 
 Per informazioni dettagliate e su come personalizzare gli argomenti, vedere https://aka.ms/teamsfx-tasks/launch-web-client.

Launch Teams desktop client. 
 See https://aka.ms/teamsfx-tasks/launch-desktop-client for details and how to customize the arguments.
teamstoolkit.taskDefinitions.args.prereq: Prompt to sign in with your Microsoft 365 account and check if you have Copilot access.
Prompt to sign in with your Microsoft 365 account and check if side-loading permission is enabled for the account.
Check if the ports are available for debugging.

teamstoolkit.manageCollaborator.command: Gestisci chi può apportare modifiche all'app
teamstoolkit.viewsWelcome.teamsfx-projec:
[Progetto di aggiornamento](comando:fx-extension.checkProjectUpgrade?%5B%22SideBar%22%5D)
Aggiornare il progetto Teams Toolkit per mantenere la compatibilità con la versione più recente. Verrà creata una directory di backup insieme a un riepilogo dell'aggiornamento. [Altre informazioni](comando:fx-extension.openDocument?%5B%22SideBar%22%2C%22learnmore%22%5D)
Se non si vuole eseguire l'aggiornamento adesso, continuare a usare Teams Toolkit versione 4.x.x.

teamstoolkit.walkthroughs.description: Avvia subito l'esperienza di sviluppo delle app di Teams
teamstoolkit.walkthroughs.withChat.descr: Jumpstart your Teams app development experience or use @teams in GitHub Copilot Extension
teamstoolkit.walkthroughs.steps.teamsToo:
Start building your first app with [Teams](https://aka.ms/teamsfx-capabilities-overview) or [Outlook add-in](https://aka.ms/teamsfx-outlook-add-in-capabilities) capabilities. Create it from scratch or explore our samples for real-world examples and code structures.
[Create a New App](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)
[View Samples](command:fx-extension.openSamples?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)

Start building your first app with [Teams](https://aka.ms/teamsfx-capabilities-overview) or [Outlook add-in](https://aka.ms/teamsfx-outlook-add-in-capabilities) capabilities. Create it from scratch or explore our samples for real-world examples and code structures.
Enhance your Teams extension experiences wtih GitHub Copilot.
[Create a New App](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)
[View Samples](command:fx-extension.openSamples?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)
 [Create App with GitHub Copilot](command:fx-extension.invokeChat?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)
__Tip: You need to have a GitHub subscription to use GitHub Copilot.__

To build app for Teams, you need a Microsoft account with custom app upload permissions. Don't have one? Create a Microsoft developer sandbox with the Microsoft 365 Developer Program.
 Notice that Microsoft 365 Developer Program requires Visual Studio subscriptions. [Get more info about Microsoft 365 Developer Program](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/office/developer-program/microsoft-365-developer-program)
[Join Microsoft 365 Developer Program](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/dev-program)

Set up cloud resources, deploy your app's code to these resources, and distribute your app to Teams.
[Open Lifecycle Commands](command:fx-extension.openLifecycleTreeview?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)
__Tip: Get more info about [Lifecycle](https://aka.ms/teamsfx-provision).__

Lo sviluppo di applicazioni Teams con JavaScript o TypeScript richiede NPM e Node.js. Controllare l'ambiente e prepararsi per il primo sviluppo di app di Teams.
[Run Prerequisite Checker](command:fx-extension.validate-getStarted-prerequisites?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)

Ecco alcuni consigli per continuare il tuo percorso con Il toolkit di Teams.
 • Esplora [Guide pratiche](command:fx-extension.selectTutorials?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D) e ottieni indicazioni più pratiche
 • Apri [Readme.md](command:fx-extension.openReadMe?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D) per comprendere come sviluppare questa app
 • Leggi il [Documentation](command:fx-extension.openDocument?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)

Press [F5](command:fx-extension.selectAndDebug?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D) or discover [Run and Debug](command:workbench.view.debug) panel on the activity bar, and click the play icon to locally preview your app in Teams context.
[Run Local Preview (F5)](command:fx-extension.selectAndDebug?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)
__Tip: To run local preview, sign in to Microsoft 365 (organizational account) with custom app upload option.__
teamstoolkit.walkthroughs.title: Introduzione a Teams Toolkit
teamstoolkit.officeAddIn.terminal.termin: * Terminal will be reused by tasks, press any key to close it.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.teams.desc: Use this Copilot extension to ask questions about Teams app development.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.create.des: Use this command to find relevant templates or samples to build your Teams app as per your description. E.g. @teams /create create an AI assistant bot that can complete common tasks.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.nextStep.d: Use this command to move to the next step at any stage of your Teams app development.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.create.too:
Your app description is too generic. To find relevant templates or samples, give specific details of your app's capabilities or technologies.

E.g. Instead of saying 'create a bot', you could specify 'create a bot template' or 'create a notification bot that sends user the stock updates'.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.create.one: We've found 1 project that matches your description. Take a look at it below.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.create.mul: We've found %d projects that match your description. Take a look at them below.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.create.noM: I cannot find any matching templates or samples. Refine your app description or explore other templates.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.nextStep.n:
This command provides guidance on your next steps based on your workspace.

E.g. If you're unsure what to do after creating a project, simply ask Copilot by using @teams /nextstep.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.default.no:
This is a procedural question, @teams can only answer questions regarding descriptions or concepts for now. You could try these commands or get more info from [Teams Toolkit documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/platform/toolkit/teams-toolkit-fundamentals).

 • /create: Use this command to find relevant templates or samples to build your Teams app as per your description. E.g. @teams /create create an AI assistant bot that can complete common tasks.

 • /nextstep: Use this command to move to the next step at any stage of your Teams app development.
teamstoolkit.chatParticipants.officeAddI: Use this command to ask questions about Office Add-ins development.
Use this command to build your Office Add-ins as per your description.
We've found a project that matches your description. Please take a look at it below.
Current workspace
Choose the location to save your project
Select Folder
Project successfully created in current workspace.
Unable to create the project.
Create this project
Use this command to move to the next step at any stage of your Office Add-ins development.

This `/nextstep` command provides guidance on your next steps based on your workspace.

E.g. To use this command, simply ask Copilot by using `@office /nextstep`.
Use this command to generate code for the Office Add-ins.
Sorry, I can't assist with that.

Currently, `@office` can only answer questions regarding add-in concepts or descriptions. For specific tasks, you could try the following commands by typing in `/`:

 • /create: Use this command to build your Office Add-ins as per your description. 

 • /generatecode: Use this command to generate code for the Office Add-ins. 

 • /nextstep: Use this command to move to the next step at any stage of your Office Add-ins development.

This is question is not relevant with Office JavaScript Add-ins, @office can only answer questions regarding Office JavaScript Add-ins. You could try these commands or get more info from [Office Add-ins documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/office/dev/add-ins/overview/office-add-ins).

 • /create: Use this command to build your Office Add-ins as per your description. 

 • /generatecode: Use this command to generate code for the Office Add-ins. 

 • /nextstep: Use this command to move to the next step at any stage of your Office Add-ins development.
I can't assist you with this request.
Attempting to fix code errors...
For your question:
Here is a code snippet using Office JavaScript API and TypeScript to help you get started:
The above code is powered by AI, so mistakes are possible. Make sure to verify the generated code or suggestions.
The response is filtered by Responsible AI service.
Generating code...
This is a complex task and may take longer, please be patient.
One moment, please.
teamstoolkit.walkthroughs.buildIntellige: Get Started with Building Intelligent Apps
Jumpstart your intelligent app development for Microsoft 365 with Teams Toolkit

Build your intelligent apps with Microsoft 365 in two ways:
🎯 Extend Microsoft Copilot with a plugin, Or
✨ Build your own Copilot in Teams using Teams AI Library and Azure services

Transform your app into a plugin to enhance Copilot's skills and boost user productivity in daily tasks and workflows. Explore [Copilot Extensibility](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-copilot/extensibility/)
[Check Copilot Access](command:fx-extension.checkCopilotAccess?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%5D)

Expand, enrich, and customize Copilot with plugins and Graph connectors in any of the following ways
[OpenAPI Description Document](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%2C%20%7B%22project-type%22%3A%20%22copilot-extension-type%22%2C%20%22capabilities%22%3A%20%22api-plugin%22%7D%5D)
[Teams Message Extension](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%2C%20%7B%22capabilities%22%3A%20%22search-app%22%2C%20%22project-type%22%3A%20%22me-type%22%2C%20%22me-architecture%22%3A%20%22bot-plugin%22%7D%5D)
[Graph Connector](command:fx-extension.openSamples?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%2C%20%22gc-nodejs-typescript-food-catalog%22%5D)

Build your intelligent, natural language-driven experiences in Teams, leveraging its vast user base for collaboration. 
Teams toolkit integrates with Azure OpenAI and Teams AI Library to streamline copilot development and offer unique Teams-based capabilities. 
Explore [Teams AI Library](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/bots/how-to/teams%20conversational%20ai/teams-conversation-ai-overview) and [Azure OpenAI Service](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/overview)

Build an AI agent bot for common tasks or an intelligent chatbot to answer specific questions
[Build a Basic AI Chatbot](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%2C%20%7B%22capabilities%22%3A%20%22custom-copilot-basic%22%2C%20%22project-type%22%3A%20%22custom-copilot-type%22%7D%5D)
[Build an AI Agent](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%2C%20%7B%22capabilities%22%3A%20%22custom-copilot-agent%22%2C%20%22project-type%22%3A%20%22custom-copilot-type%22%7D%5D)
[Build a Bot to Chat with Your Data](command:fx-extension.createFromWalkthrough?%5B%22WalkThrough%22%2C%20%7B%22capabilities%22%3A%20%22custom-copilot-rag%22%2C%20%22project-type%22%3A%20%22custom-copilot-type%22%7D%5D)

Explore these resources to build intelligent apps and enhance your development projects
🗒️ [Generative AI for Beginners](https://github.com/microsoft/generative-ai-for-beginners/tree/main)
✨ [Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/search/retrieval-augmented-generation-overview)
📚 [AI Learning and Community Hub](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/ai/)
teamstoolkit.m365.needSignIn.message: You need to sign in your Microsoft 365 account.
